website_summaries.verdict: A workhorse pad that’s a staple for schooling and everyday use in both English and Western.
pros: Polyester cotton with diamond quilting and flannel lining, this can survive multiple hot washes and still keep going
Velcro billet strips and girth keepers stop any slippage
Wide range of colors available, as well as a shaped all-purpose option
cons: Runs large and can be too long for shorter-backed horses

customer_reviews.title: Super super super bright neon yellow
customer_reviews.text: Super super super bright neon yellow! LOVEE ITT! Looks like it will glow under black-light! Just got a bright orange treeless saddle and they look awesome together! Yay! The pad is also a slightly bigger size, which works perfect because the saddle is more bulky like a trail saddle and I want more yellow showing. It is the typical AP saddle pad thickness. Not overly pillow fluffy but still has basic padding. It also has very soft fleecy like Lining on the back side.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: INCREDIBLE VALUE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I love the fleecy lining. Just what I was looking for thickness wise. I tried it on my 23 year 16 hand TB with some withers. So nice to have a saddle blanket that goes past the end of the saddle, is longer on the sides. Did not remove the tags or use the velcro fasteners for first tryout. Saddle stayed in same position on the pad at end of ride. Wither clearance at the end of the ride was the same as when I first saddled up. Used in combination with ECP Cotton Quilted Half Saddle Pad on top and it was even more perfect for my older horse.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie M.

customer_reviews.title: well, made saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: As a horse person all my life and used a zillion saddle pads...this one very nice. Because quilted, not very thick but that works well on the English Saddles. Certainly generous in size. Would buy it again. Only reason it gets 4 stars, and maybe not fair, I just can't after 40 years of saddle pads, say I love it....
customer_reviews.author: Gaely

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but is NOT functional
customer_reviews.text: The material seems fine, the padding seems fine for a light saddle pad. The underside is white, which was honestly very surprising to me. The white is very soft, almost fleecy, which is nice out of the box but will become hell to clean later. The blue fabric is nice- seems like it won’t hold onto dirt too much. My major annoyances with this pad are.. 1) the lack of straps (yellow circles) to fasten to the saddles billet straps 2) the misaligned straps for the girth (red lines) There is no way this pad will stay in place.. more than half of the major components for making this pad useful are missing or wrong! Save your money. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: I am normally a big fan of Tuffrider products, not so much with this pad. I bought it in purple and the color is true to the picture, although I wish it were a deeper purple. This pad is very thin and the shape is not all that great for my high-withered TB. The bad is white on the underside which shows dirt, but is also very soft. I use it with a half pad anyway, but wish it had a bit more padding. it doesn't have the attachments for the girth straps at the top (which I seldom use anyway) but this pad seems to slide around a bit. Tuffrider, you can do better!.
customer_reviews.author: Julsie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap pads, but functional
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with these pads. On the one hand- they are much less expensive than many other brands of saddle pads. On the other hand- they are of very average quality and they fade and wear as a cheap saddle pad would. That being said, I still use the pads that I bought five years ago. They have held up well enough. They look tatty at this point, but they still function.
customer_reviews.author: Kitchen goddess

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect size
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in and could tell right away it was too small. The dimensions listed on Amazon are not what I received. The spine measurement is almost 20 and the length 22. The whole purpose in buying this was the size that was listed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 19" forward-flap jump saddle (long femurs) and this pad fits that whole saddle with an inch or two to spare around the front and the back (I was pleasantly surprised by this). It's thin but sturdy, and the underside is ugly (white/undyed), but it stays in place and comes in a bunch of colors. I'd rather have one good half pad and a bunch of these than spend exponentially more money on full pads!
customer_reviews.author: thebyrdbrain

customer_reviews.title: Thin but soft.
customer_reviews.text: My OTTB lou has always had problems with saddle pads rubbing his withers raw. I wanted a thing breathable one for the hot summer months and still something that looks clean and beautiful in the show ring. I’ve boughy both the black and the white and they both wash so so well. And they are extremely comfortable for Lou. I definitely plan to buy more of these in all sorts of colors.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Zeski

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday/Any Saddle Pad
customer_reviews.text: After a year, it's held up really well! I little piling of the filling between stitches, but that is to be expected when machine washing a drying as much as it has been. Color has faded a bit, but it's still a fabulous everyday pad. Has fit all 5 different saddles I've used on it, from closet contact, to A/P, to dressage, and kids size saddles.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Anson

customer_reviews.title: Great, soft and better than any other pad we have
customer_reviews.text: We have so many pads to match ear bonnets that can be so pricey. This one was reasonably priced for my daughter. She saved her money and bought this. Came early, super soft, girth strap to help keep it in place and well made. Hands down better than all the other ones I’ve purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Madeira

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Saddle Pad!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Great color (green), nice lightweight pad. I really don’t get the slippage issues some have reported considering you can attach it to the saddle in 4 places. Mine has never slipped, and I only attach at the girth. I have a 16 hand thoroughbred and it’s the right size for him.
customer_reviews.author: Doxie fan

customer_reviews.title: Chemical on pad
customer_reviews.text: I received this pad and I took it out and whatever was on this the pad or sprayed it made me break out and had chemical burn on both arms. Just wanted to warn some of yall of this as it can happen to u also. Update: this company took great care of me with this product.
customer_reviews.author: BESTEP

customer_reviews.title: Very wide
customer_reviews.text: Received this pad today in the mail (fast shipping) and while I do like the color and size overall, it is very wide. I have a long backed quarter horse and I'm excited to try it on him as I think the length is perfect. Just wish is wasn't as wide as it is. Would be great for dressage saddles though! And it is thin so you would definitely need a half pad for it
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Beal

customer_reviews.title: Great saddlepad
customer_reviews.text: I now currently have two of these saddlepads, I originally wanted some saddlepads for schooling in fun colors, I ride mostly dressage and I do some jumping too. My main concern was that it had to fit under my dressage saddle, and it did just fine. The saddlepad is way better quality than I was expecting, it wasn't too thick but not super thin and cheap either, just perfect. It has velcro straps in the front that you can fasten to the billets to keep it in place, which I prefer over the ones that are sown on.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a great pad!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this pad! For the price of these you cannot go wrong! I’ve had it for a little over two months now and it’s doing great! Everyone seems to complain about the size but i don’t think it’s bad at all, i hate tiny pads because your can barely see it or it’s not even fitting under the entire saddle. This horse is quite small and it looks cute on her. Great material for how cheap it is too. Not too thick but thick enough. It’s pretty flexible but holds a nice shape as well. Over great pad, i WILL be buying more!
customer_reviews.author: Kierra Moss

customer_reviews.title: Theyre great!
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a very thick pad- this is not your saddle pad. It is relatively thin but not anywhere close to a baby pad and fits perfectly under a well fitting saddle! Much better than paying too much money for something that gets dirty ALL the time, seems like they will last and wash well!
customer_reviews.author: NSKDodge

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Color and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this color is blue! Everyone at the barn has mentioned how pretty this blue color is. When it’s dirty, I toss it in the washing machine and it cleans up super easily. Going to save up money and buy more colors with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Giannini

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice saddle pad! It is great. I have almost had it for a year. Holding up very nicely. I would totally recommend this! The only problem is that is a little thin. I would recommend using a shaped wool pad. Also, if you ride on a hot summer day, the dirt and sweat will bleed through. This shouldn't be a problem due to the fact that your saddle will cover that up. It cleans very nicely too, but it might take two washes. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Davis

customer_reviews.title: Far bigger than noted
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as promised but, far bigger than a standard size blanket as described and really not usable as a result since the girth does not fit through slots. Your horse may be bigger than the two I ride but I would check size promptly on arrival so you can exchange or return if needed.
customer_reviews.author: rdell65

customer_reviews.title: On the pink side of purple
customer_reviews.text: The color is a very pinkish purple, not a nice royal purple so it’s not a good match for a lot of other purple horse gear if you are trying to match but is perfect for a horse mad girl, like my 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pape

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price!
customer_reviews.text: This saddle pad thoughhhh. Honestly it isn’t that great but my color was 10 buckaroos! This is so cheap because everything in the equestrian world costs a large fortune. Good for jumping and dressage saddles, not the most padded but my sensitive thoughrobred doesn’t really seem to mind. Overall very happy and felt like I️ got even more then what I put in for this pad!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Flame🔥

customer_reviews.title: I got the purple, and the light blue saddle pad around last year.
customer_reviews.text: I got the purple, and the light blue saddle pad around last year. The purple one has a tear (tiny, I still ride in it) but other then that it has held up. It has been through the wash multiple times and held up pretty well. The colors are the exact colors as shown. The only problem I had other then the fact that the purple one has already torn some, they are HUGE saddle pads. I gave it 3 stars because they do tear, and they are very large. (Definitely a horse pad).
customer_reviews.author: awsome game

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good pad for the price. It's not as sturdy as some of the more expensive pads. But the color is very vibrant and she loves it. So if it doesn't hold up I won't be upset and will get her a new one. There are plenty of colors to choose from which is nice for my young rider. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Weird shape
customer_reviews.text: I really liked to color of this saddle pad. However, it said it is a all purpose saddle pad but the dimensions seem to be a bit off. The vertical length is more like a dressage saddle pad. I put it up against my other all purpose pads and it is shorter on horizontal wise. It might fit a pony better than a horse.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Love this pad
customer_reviews.text: Love this pad! the only thing that i was dissipated on was how thin it is you need to use a half pad on every horse you use this pad with. but the color is true and it works great
customer_reviews.author: Barnstormer

customer_reviews.title: Good thin liner pad.
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but thin. If you just want something to keep the dirt off your saddle and not too much padding, this works great. If you're looking for cushion, look elsewhere. Top is semi-slick, so does not hold seeds or grasses. Bottom is semi-grippy fabric so holds in place well, but also holds dirt and hair. Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Cantrell

customer_reviews.title: I love this pad!
customer_reviews.text: I love this saddle pad because its affordable and durable. My horse and I love it a lot because its soft underneath but the colour is exquisite! I would recommend it to anyone who is looking to buy a new saddle pad or looking for their first! Arrived right on time!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Snowcobbler

customer_reviews.title: Very vibrant !
customer_reviews.text: Very nice color but runs short in length and too long by girth area. I have it on a large round pony at 14.2 and I have never had issues with saddle pads not fitting her structure . A lil thin and recommend a half pad .
customer_reviews.author: Artist4life

customer_reviews.title: Easy to wash and retains color
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has been riding horses for about two years now. According to her we needed a saddle pad that she could bring to her lesson and use on her own. I figured for the price why not? I was pleasantly surprised at how thick this is and even after several washes it has retained the nice lime green color!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Mirkin

customer_reviews.title: Color is on one side only bottom is white.
customer_reviews.text: The underside of the pink pad IS NOT pink, but white. Wish the pad was pink on both sides like the $10. pads on a well known horse site...
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Inexpensive Pad
customer_reviews.text: I love this pad!! It's such great quality for how inexpensive it is. It's fairly thin with a fleece underside, but is still very durable. I have been using this saddle pad for about 6 months now and is still holding up great. I just throw it in the washer with the rest of my saddle pads and it has held up just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, great price, exactly what I needed and expected.
customer_reviews.author: NCS

customer_reviews.title: Adequate everyday pad
customer_reviews.text: No frills. Good color. Won't last a lifetime. Stays put during the ride.
customer_reviews.author: poodlez

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are huge. I thought it would work for my AP saddle but it really doesn't. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Rohanok

customer_reviews.title: Looks very well made feels soft and seems easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: Looks very well made feels soft and seems easy to wash. Excited to use it. Did seem to run a little small but could be how i ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Definitely would recommend washing it before using it for the first time
customer_reviews.text: I used the pad yesterday for the first time on my horse who hadn't been ridden for almost 5 months. After I took daddle off I noticed hair was missing straight across on both sides of spine. Only explanation I came up with is possibly an allergic reaction. Should have washed pad prior to using, maybe there are chemicals in it, not sure. But I hadn't noticed hair missing prior. Definitely would recommend washing it before using it for the first time. I like the cotton padding, size seems good for my saddle.
customer_reviews.author: Velvet

customer_reviews.title: Really nice rich buttery yellow all purpose saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice all purpose pad - a little on the larger size - and comes in a rich buttery yellow. I added minion patches and it's looks adorable on my niece's pony! I've also ordered their apple green pad for my horse - I like that they offer both standard colors (white, black, burgundy, hunter) as well additional colors that other a/p pad manufacturers don't.
customer_reviews.author: L. Haywood

customer_reviews.title: Skip this one
customer_reviews.text: Ordered AP pads but they are shaped like dressage pads, and they are SHINY.
customer_reviews.author: hannah619

customer_reviews.title: Came damaged, oversized
customer_reviews.text: It has stains on it upon arrival. It is also huge... I think my ottb would drown in it. I would have used it if not for the stains, but since I already am unhappy with it AND it is damaged upon arrival, all I want is it gone and my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: I like the shape of this pad and that it is ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the shape of this pad and that it is lifted slightly at the withers. It seems bigger than a lot of the other all purpose pads I have and it bunches a little under my girth when I tighten it. Overall though, it's a good saddle pad for the price and comes in a lot of fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the royal blue - beautiful color but it fits big
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the royal blue - beautiful color but it fits big. I have an average sized thoroughbred so I expected it to fit better but it was a great price so I'm not trying to complain. Will not be ordering another because I hate how it gets bunchy
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Seam came unraveled the first time I washed this saddle ...
customer_reviews.text: Seam came unraveled the first time I washed this saddle pad. Lasted less than a week. Colour also faded after one wash in cold water with gentle plant based frangrance free laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: ms

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it. She loves anything that has to do with horses
customer_reviews.author: Michael  Medeiros

customer_reviews.title: Awesome price and product
customer_reviews.text: We like it, and it came promptly and in good packaging condition. We would buy again
customer_reviews.author: erinmichelle7

customer_reviews.title: So bright
customer_reviews.text: The pad is annoyingly bright, which is exactly how I like them. It’s thin but it’s comfortable and it’s very soft. Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ocean Blue color
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this saddle pad for my son's first show. The Ocean Blue is a nice darker turqouise color. (Darker than stock photo) The pad itself is well-constructed. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: heart.u

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for English amateurs
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright. Slips a lot. Good for people who don’t really ride English like me who only ride English for fun (I ride western reining full time)
customer_reviews.author: CarolBowers

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality Junk - Weird Sizes
customer_reviews.text: Weird size & too short for the length of a small adult all purpose English saddle. Four inches sits off the blanket and on the horse. :(

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: Color is not true to what it actually is. I would not say this is 'hot' pink, more of a mellowed out pink. It is still pretty but I was a little upset when it didn't match my tack. I use it often and it is a really nice pad!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonEquestrian

customer_reviews.title: It is too small.
customer_reviews.text: I most likely wont even get to use this as it's way too small. The quality is nice, it is just too small for my saddle and quarter horse.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Dee

customer_reviews.title: Pretty But Not Functional.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pad in both Apple Green and Ocean, and while I love the colors, it fits awkwardly on my 17.1hh OTTB and bunches up during rides. They look like quality pads (before they bunch) and I've had no problem with durability, but they are very thin and cannot be ridden in alone, which isn't a huge deal because I always use a half pad anyways but...All in all I will not be purchasing more. I wish it could've worked out better for the both of us, TuffRider. I really do.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlynn Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Works great with my 17" close contact saddle.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great with my 17" close contact saddle. Great color. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Harden

customer_reviews.title: Nice inexpensive pad
customer_reviews.text: Tuff rider makes a good saddle pad- I monogram these for resale, and my customers like them.
customer_reviews.author: Nanarrow

customer_reviews.title: This did not fit my morgan mare very well. ...
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit my morgan mare very well. It is thin and does not lay flat after riding with a saddle.
customer_reviews.author: SY-W

customer_reviews.title: Thin but well made. Not for my aussie saddle.
customer_reviews.text: A tad to short in length along back for my aussie saddle. Also elastic is not quite low enough to weave western style girth through.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good pad for the price, but I don't like the white underside. It always looks dirty!
customer_reviews.author: LBee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality as expected
customer_reviews.text: Great quality as expected, though I was a little surprised it has fleece on the bottom, but I don't mind one bit.
customer_reviews.author: sweptclean

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but seems big
customer_reviews.text: I like this pad. The quality is good and it was as described. It was too big (long) for my 15hh Arab, so I actually am not using it much because it eats up his whole back and makes him look tiny! I have other Tuffrider pads and this one seems much bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Mir

customer_reviews.title: Royal Blue
customer_reviews.text: Clearly not the Royal Blue that I ordered or what is pictured in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Lutz

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: It came just when it said it would and is exactly as advertised. I love the soft material underneath, it may be a smidge hard to clean but that's fine, it won't be seen anyway. Seems very durable.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON ROSHTO

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Nice horse blanket. We have several and they wash and wear beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon M.

customer_reviews.title: Great saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: Great saddle pad! Fits my 17" Pessoa wonderfully. It's thin enough to not cause bulk/heat under the saddle but substantial enough that it's the only pad I use. Doesn't slip and cleans easily (although I have not washed it yet, just spot clean).
customer_reviews.author: Woppet

customer_reviews.title: I love how soft they are
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews, but I will for these pads. I love how soft they are.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Mari Embry

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Just what we expected. Basic. Color was just like the pic. Fabric medium weight not heavy like most. For the price you could buy several.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Good price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice pad. It is stitched well and is the perfect size. I picked the black color and I've already washed it. It washed well and is ready to go back to the barn. Reasonable price and fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Angie H.

customer_reviews.title: Not awful, but your money would be better spent elsewhere.
customer_reviews.text: Material was thin and not as brightly colored as the picture online. Functional as a pad, but not as pretty and soft as I was hoping. I'll stick with Roma pads from now on-- those last ages.
customer_reviews.author: jumpit

customer_reviews.title: The great price will make your barn look like that one pintrest thing your daughter saw.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 15 year old daughter. Apparently will be ordering more because "mom!!!! Have you seen on pintrest where they have all those different colored pads an boots? Isnt that awesome?"
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for my horses!! Looks beautiful and fits nicely
customer_reviews.author: Shawnnee

customer_reviews.title: These pads are the perfect size! I have a larger saddle and was ...
customer_reviews.text: These pads are the perfect size! I have a larger saddle and was finding the normal pads were always too short. These fit great and my half pad doesn't get dirty now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really basic, not thick or cushy, but otherwise ok for the money
customer_reviews.author: Emily Myers

customer_reviews.title: I love this saddle pad and would recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I love this saddle pad and would recommend it to anyone. It fits my haflinger amazing. It gets really dirty on her but I absolutely love it and I recently wore it to a horse show and placed 4th.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Stover

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice pad, large in size, we use a 16” English saddle and the pad shows all the way around
customer_reviews.author: Kay Brumley

customer_reviews.title: That’s is really comfortable for my thoroughbred
customer_reviews.text: That’s is really comfortable for my thoroughbred ,I m do it in western,I just put a extra blanket in the bottom,that’s look good in a good price
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Romo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pad
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I thought they would be, very nice size and well made. I use soft treeless saddle so I only need light weight pad, these are great so I bought two. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Color is just like in picture and holds up to repeated washings. Quality Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Worthless pad
customer_reviews.text: Totally worthless pad. Bunches up so looks terrible and is non functional. Had to throw it away. Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: ellen d

customer_reviews.title: Not what’s advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is not the product pictured, there are no billet straps and it is a polyester material shiny almost nylon like
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but fits well and looks nice. You'd need a saddle blanket to go under ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't ridden in it yet, but fits well and looks nice. You'd need a saddle blanket to go under this saddle pad though, not enough cushion for a comfortable ride on your horse. Nice looks and quality though, couldn't tell ya what the straps are for though.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H

customer_reviews.title: fast and as described
customer_reviews.text: just what we needed super fast delivery in time for our horse show!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlyn

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great quality at an amazing price. It is much larger than expected so it didn't work on my 14 hand pony, but it's perfect for our horse. Arrive very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Jen L

customer_reviews.title: This pad was a lot bigger than I expected. ...
customer_reviews.text: This pad was a lot bigger than I expected. Next time I will read the description carefully and take measurements with my saddle!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: love the lineing
customer_reviews.text: love the lineing...it is the only affordable basic pad with it and I have been looking for this product for a while because I bought 3 over three years ago and it is worn but still use it for practice and schooling. these are terrific for summer, nice and light and cooler for your horse. They are also a good size not short like quite a few pads I have bought.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Maia

customer_reviews.title: Durable, true to colour
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple one - colour is exactly as depicted, and it fits my short-backed cob perfectly. I have been using it for a year and it is still as new. You need an underseat or a sheepskin for this, though, it does not have padding.
customer_reviews.author: Lara S

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this pad! The only reason I didn't like it was that it was too big for my pony and looked a little over sized. Would still recommend to anyone that has a regular sized horse!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING PAD GREAT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Super pretty color and a lot thicker than I expected You know that saying “you get what you pay for “ but not in this case you get more than you pay for with this pad
customer_reviews.author: Nicki

customer_reviews.title: Very thin...
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, but very large and thin. Will not irder again.
customer_reviews.author: Nursing101

customer_reviews.title: Nice large pad
customer_reviews.text: Nice large pad, I was looking for something that would fit under my dressage saddle and this does the trick. Only issue is that it does slide back, but I think sewing the bottom keeper strap closer to the width of the girth will take care of that.
customer_reviews.author: Harlehot

customer_reviews.title: Good saddle pad
customer_reviews.text: A good saddle pad i have 3 now and will be buying more colors
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: It came in very good packaging, the color is brilliant
customer_reviews.text: It came in very good packaging, the color is brilliant, and I was pleasantly surprised to find a soft lining on the underside of the pad. Rode in it for the first time today and my horse seemed very comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it!!! It looks so good and it's not flimsy at all. It's true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: The color is a little lighter than it appears in ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is a little lighter than it appears in the picture, but well made, fits my saddles and horses.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Morten

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Pad
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a birthday present for my 14-yr old niece. Color was a beautiful light blue, just as pictured on the monitor. It arrived flat, not folded, which made for a good presentation as a gift. My niece loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Would probably buy again for the price
customer_reviews.text: Kind of thin and didn’t really fit my narrow withered horse, but it’s perfect for practicing and riding lessons. Would be so easy to throw in the washer to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: ScarlettaRose

customer_reviews.title: it's one solid color nothing fancy but the inside is white I was kind of upset about that because it will definitely get extreme
customer_reviews.text: I got the hunter green saddle pad, it's one solid color nothing fancy but the inside is white I was kind of upset about that because it will definitely get extremely dirty. But it is a good well made saddle pad, haven't tried it out yet so we will see how it holds up!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Hulen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly as described! This will be the third one purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Brock

customer_reviews.title: mine was actually black - the same color as the top side of the pad which is PERFECT. Love it - seems like durable material but
customer_reviews.text: I read the posts which said the underside of the pad was white...mine was actually black - the same color as the top side of the pad which is PERFECT. Love it - seems like durable material but I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Gibbons

customer_reviews.title: Very good pad for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very good pad for the money. It is nice and large, I usually have trouble finding pads that are long enough to extend past the end of a cutback saddle, but this had room to spare. Not a very thick pad, but it has a soft underside and is good quality. Color is true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth W. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Nice pad, smells strange
customer_reviews.text: Nice schooling pad but it smells kind of strange. I thought there was a men's cologne sample in the box but it was the pad. I let it sit outside a couple of days and it doesn't smell as much.
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: cheap, quality, beautiful color
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Royal blue looks amazing on my grey mare. Large pad works well with dressage or jumping saddle.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna B

product_meta.title: TuffRider Basic All Purpose Saddle Pad | Equestrian Bareback Riding Pad | Horse Riding Pad
feature_bullets: Comes with a cotton flannel underside and channel quilting
All-purpose pad is perfect during training or competition
